body_html:
My question is how do I attach the operations that I get from TF_Buffer op_list_buf = TF_GetOpList(lib); tensorflow::OpList op_list; to the current session/ graph? As i am just using C++ for inference, and these custom operations are not a part of either input or output nodes, i cannot figure out this.

I can also work with building tensorflow from source with the custom ops, but these have a dependency on TF, any documented build process with .cc, .cu files would be useful
